In 2012 he became widely known for his fatwa calling for the death of rapper Shahin Najafi for apostasy. * * * * * Golpaygani died in Qom, Iran on 1 February 2022 from cardiac arrest at the age of 102. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Iranian politicians Category:Iranian centenarians
